alert.note: Alert for Logan; Montgomery; Polk; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:20PM CDT until April 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LOGAN...SCOTT...NORTHEASTERN POLK...SOUTHWESTERN YELL AND NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 420 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Waldron to 6 miles northeast of Mena, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mena... Waldron... Mount Ida... Oden... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Cardiff... Gravelly... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mauldin... Muddy Creek WMA... Acorn... Olio... Winfield... Ink... Bluffton... Pine Ridge... Boles... Dallas... Blue Ball... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.
